query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.userLogin=?1 and u.company.login=?2
SELECT u.userId FROM User AS u WHERE u.active = true
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.userLogin=?1 and u.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.userLogin=?1 and u.companyId=?2 and u.userId<>?3
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.userLogin=?1 and u.userPassword=?2 and u.company.login=?3
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.userLogin=?1 and u.company.login=?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.isDefaultUser=true and u.company.companyId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.company.companyId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.companyId=?1 and u.active=?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.companyId=?1 and u.addressId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM User AS u WHERE u.companyId=?1 and u.addressId=?2 and u.type=?3
SELECT COUNT (u.userId) FROM User AS u WHERE u.companyId=?1 AND u.userId <> ?2 AND u.mobileActive = TRUE
SELECT COUNT (u.userId) FROM User AS u WHERE u.companyId=?1 AND u.mobileActive = TRUE
SELECT COUNT (u.userId) FROM User AS u WHERE u.companyId=?1 AND u.userId <> ?2 AND u.enableMobileWVApp = TRUE
SELECT COUNT (u.userId) FROM User AS u WHERE u.companyId=?1 AND u.enableMobileWVApp = TRUE
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Company AS u WHERE u.login=?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Company AS u WHERE u.copyTemplate=?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM Company AS u WHERE u.copyTemplate=?1 and u.language=?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM Role as r WHERE r.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM Role as r WHERE r.companyId = ?1 and r.isDefault=true
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM Role as r WHERE r.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(sm) FROM SystemModule AS sm ORDER BY sm.path ASC
SELECT OBJECT(sf) FROM SystemFunction AS sf WHERE sf.functionCode = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(ar) FROM AccessRights AS ar WHERE ar.moduleId= ?1 and ar.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(ar) FROM AccessRights AS ar WHERE ar.functionId= ?1 and ar.roleId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(ar) FROM AccessRights AS ar WHERE ar.roleId = ?1 and ar.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(te) FROM UserGroup as te WHERE te.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM UserGroup as u WHERE u.groupName = ?1 and u.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM UserGroup as u WHERE u.companyId = ?1 and u.groupType = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM UserOfGroup AS r WHERE r.userGroupId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM UserSessionLog AS r WHERE r.sessionId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM UserSessionLog AS r WHERE r.isConnected = ?1 ORDER BY r.lastActionDateTime DESC
SELECT r.userId FROM UserSessionLog AS r WHERE r.isConnected = true ORDER BY r.lastActionDateTime DESC
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM UserSessionLog AS r WHERE r.companyId = ?1 and r.isConnected = true
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM UserRole AS r WHERE r.userId = ?1 and r.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM UserRole AS r WHERE r.roleId = ?1 and r.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM RolePasswordChange AS r WHERE r.passwordChangeId = ?1 and r.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM RolePasswordChange AS r WHERE r.roleId = ?1 and r.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(r) FROM RolePasswordChange AS r WHERE r.roleId = ?1 and r.passwordChange.changeTime > ?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM UserPasswordChange AS u WHERE u.passwordChangeId = ?1 and u.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(u) FROM UserPasswordChange AS u WHERE u.userId = ?1 and u.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(d) FROM DynamicSearch AS d WHERE d.name = ?1 and d.module =?2 and d.userId =?3
SELECT OBJECT(f) FROM DynamicSearchField AS f WHERE f.dynamicSearchId = ?1 ORDER BY f.position asc
